item.title: Niva Bupa calls cashless health cover claim denial allegation ‘baseless’

review.headline_rewrite: Niva Bupa calls cashless health cover claim denial allegation ‘baseless’
bullets: A few days after a post on social media on an alleged denial of a ₹61-lakh cashless claim of a patient with a ₹2.40-crore
According to the post on LinkedIn, Niva Bupa Health Insurance denied a ₹61-lakh cashless claim of Chandra Kumar Jain, who has been battling Myeloid
In response, Niva Bupa dismissed the allegations as “baseless”, and called out the “fear-mongering narratives around the case”.
Jain has been our policyholder since November 18, 2021.
